DOC.brief_summary: The study double-blind , randomize , within-subject control , 2-armed , single-centre study sponsor SciVision Biotech Inc. approve Yuan 's General Hospital Institutional Review Board . The aim post-marketing study evaluate safety efficacy HYADERMIS LA facial dermal implant improvement nasolabial fold . The study estimate hold half one year include 0-2 week screen period , day treatment , follow-up week 1 2 . Patient informed consent form obtain volunteer enter screening period . If volunteer meet criterion , give number replace name study . The participant randomise assigned receive experiment treatment , HYADERMIS LA , one side nasolabial fold control treatment , Hya-Dermis , side face . The safety assessment evaluate recorded adverse event follow device treatment either blind evaluator subject . The effectiveness treatment device assess use photographic assessment , nasoalabial fold severity scale , global aesthetic improvement scale , pain visual analog scale .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Efficacy Using HYADERMIS LA Wrinkle Correction
DOC.criteria: Be 25 60 year age sex willing receive nasolabial fold correction intradermal injection procedure Have approximately symmetrical nasolabial fold nasolabial fold severity grade 24 grade difference two side less 1 Agree refrain undergo invasive aesthetic treatment injective area 12 month injection Agree refrain undergoing physical chemical aesthetic treatment injective area 3 month injection If female childbearing potential , breastfeeding , negative urine pregnancy test treatment day agree use approved contraceptive medically acceptable method birth control throughout study Have ability understand comply study requirement , provide write informed consent prior procedure Have history active dermal disease , inflammation , related disease Had permanent semipermanent implantation nasolabial area Had invasive aesthetic treatment surgery history 6 month treatment Had physical chemical aesthetic treatment 1 month study start Have history coagulation defect diseases still take aspirin , anticlotting , blood activate medication 1 week treatment Have AdamsStokes syndrome , wolffprkinsonwhite syndrome , severe sinus node , atrioventricular node dysfunction , block ventricular Have know history allergic reaction like hypersensitivity hyaluronic acid Have know history allergic reaction like hypersensitivity lidocaine anaesthetic Have poor compliance study followup schedule
